TopicTitle: Resources invisible, map view off centre, can't choose target

Articles.Content:
Hope I am posting in right forum

I am Playing 1.0.5 on Mac

(1) Planets appear off centre in map view

(2) resources are invisible even when I have performed scan

[img]http://i.imgur.com/LX5i2L3.png[/img]

This happens even when I am playing an unmodded game.

[U][URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/138802-Kerbal-Space-Program-1-0-5-New-Issues-Repository"]To the known issues thread Batman![/URL][/U]

[U][URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/138802-Kerbal-Space-Program-1-0-5-New-Issues-Repository#trackingcenter_resource_overlay"]Tracking center resources.[/URL][/U]

[U][URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/138802-Kerbal-Space-Program-1-0-5-New-Issues-Repository#map_offset"]Map offset.[/URL][/U]

[U][URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/138802-Kerbal-Space-Program-1-0-5-New-Issues-Repository#trackingcenter_resource_overlay"]Resources not shown in the TC.[/URL][/U]

These are a priority for 1.1, all UI stuff is deferred because of the Unity5 UI overhaul :)
